description.p: Casper, J., Micire, M., Hyams, J., and Murphy, R., “A Case Study of How Mobile Robot Competitions Promote Research,” RoboCup 2001 : Robot Soccer World Cup V, Springer, A. Birk, S. Coradeschi, S. Tadokoro, editors, 2002. [Bib]

Murphy, R., Casper, J., and Micire, M., “Potential Tasks and Research Issues of Mobile Robots in RoboCup Rescue,” RoboCup-2000 : Robot Soccer World Cup IV, Springer Verlag, Berlain, Peter Stone, Tucker Balch, Gerhard Kraetszchmar, editors, 2001, pp. 339-344.
